name: Subaquatic Lounge 01 (Great Barrier Reef Institute of Marine Toxicology), The Offshore Firm (2021)
description:
"Subaquatic Lounge 01 (Great Barrier Reef Institute of Marine Toxicology)"
The Offshore Firm (2021)
1260 x 900 px, GIF

///////// In order to keep the Postdocs from revolting, the Subaquatic Lounge was made available to them on Sundays. This displeased the deans and Offshore executives, who made ample use of the Subaquatic Lounge during their diving excursions. But sometimes these little sacrifices are inevitable, and while the Postdocs enjoyed access to the Lounge on Sundays, they were denied the password to the satellite TV service, having instead to content themselves with watching their own research footage. /////////

Metarealistic game photography depicting hypercorporate, antisocial, and sometimes liminal virtual environments.

This photographed scene was created using "The Life Stage: Virtual House," a building design simulator released in 1993 for the 3DO console.

Although the game has fallen into obscurity, it was notably ahead of its time for its use of photographic gameplay elements within an immersive 3D virtual space.

// Artwork by Sabato Visconti // www.sabatobox.com // @sabatobox on IG //
